br.ufmg.dcc.saotome.beholder.selenium.ui

Class SeleniumComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.ufmg.dcc.saotome.beholder.selenium.ui.SeleniumComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    br.ufmg.dcc.saotome.beholder.ui.Component, br.ufmg.dcc.saotome.beholder.ui.event.Displayable

    public abstract class SeleniumComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements br.ufmg.dcc.saotome.beholder.ui.Component
    This abstract class implements the interface HtmlComponent using the Selenium-Webdriver to simulate the interaction between the component and a system user.
    Author:
    √çcaro Clever F. Braga (icaroclever@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Component

      • isValidElementTag

        public abstract boolean isValidElementTag()
        Verify if the element loaded is a valid element for the class that is representing it.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the HTML tag is valid to current class, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the element is invalid.

      • validateElementTag

      • getBasicLocator

        public abstract java.lang.String getBasicLocator()
        This method returns the basic location that represents the html object in the html page. For example, if a object is identified by tag , the basic xpath must be a[ \@attrib='foo' ]
        Returns:
        Returns a minimal xpath representation of the html object on the browser's page.

      • getLocator

        public java.lang.String getLocator(java.lang.Integer index)
        Returns the relative locator to find the html object on HTML page using the index of the HTML object to recover it.
        Parameters:
        index - HTML index of the object. Starts with 1.
        Returns:
        Returns a relative xpath representation of the html object on the browser's page.
